muclient.script:
-- ******************************************************************** -- ***** Quows' EFF Stat Functions ***** -- ********************************************************************
iWizardWeightMultiplier = 37.5 iWitchWeightMultiplier = 55
-- Check if user has the CowBar v3.0+ installed for enhanced item-links of suggested shields bHasCowbar = false if (GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) ~= nil and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) == true and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 19) >= 3) then bHasCowbar = true end
-- ************************************************ -- * Check if the user has timers enabled or not: * -- ************************************************ if (GetCurrentValue("enable_timers") ~= 1) then SetOption ("enable_timers", 1) Note("") ColourNote(sCOLOUR.orange, "", "Quow's EFF Plugin Notice:") ColourNote(sCOLOUR.silver, "", "Your timers in MUSHclient were disabled. Timers are needed for many features throughout Quow's plugins.") ColourNote(sCOLOUR.silver, "", "This plugin has now force-enabled timers in your MUSHclient world settings for you, you do not need to do anything!") Note("") end
function QuowEFFHelp() ColourNote("darkorange", "", "Quow's EFF/Floater Plugin Helpfile:") ColourNote("silver", "", "=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff help") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : This help information")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff version") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Show version info for this plugin")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff hide") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Hide successful 'swoop and block' floater defense messages sent by the mud")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff show") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Show successful 'swoop and block' floater defense messages sent by the mud") ColourNote("silver", "", " (Note: Other plugins or custom triggers could also hide these messages)")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff reset") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Reset the plugin's stored stats for your EFF - WARNING - no confirmation needed!")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff stats") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Show basic hit/miss/knockdown stats recorded since the last time you reset these stats")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff check witch") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Check your ma.sp.de bonus and suggest a witch-based floater for your skills") ColourNote("silver", "", " (you can also use 'gshg suggest', 'check', or 'recommend')")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff check") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Check your ma.sp.de bonus and suggest floaters to check for your skills") ColourNote("silver", "", " (you can also use 'eff suggest', or 'eff recommend')")
ColourTell("silver", "", "'") ColourTell("darkorange", "", "eff check [1-1000]") ColourNote("silver", "", "' : Add a given % to all shield weights as if LLEB'd, then calculate suggestions") ColourNote("silver", "", " (for example, 'eff check 25')") end
function QuowEFFVersion() ColourNote("darkorange", "", "Quow's EFF Helper and Stats Plugin is on version: " .. tostring(GetPluginInfo("bff25308e015986fb2a56f3f", 19)) .. " [" .. os.date("%d %b %Y", GetPluginInfo("bff25308e015986fb2a56f3f", 14)) .. "]") end
bHideEFF = false if (GetVariable("bHideEFF") == "true") then bHideEFF = true end iQuowEFFDrops = tonumber(GetVariable("iQuowEFFDrops")) if (iQuowEFFDrops == nil) then iQuowEFFDrops = 0 end iQuowEFFBlocks = tonumber(GetVariable("iQuowEFFBlocks")) if (iQuowEFFBlocks == nil) then iQuowEFFBlocks = 0 end iQuowEFFMiss = tonumber(GetVariable("iQuowEFFMiss")) if (iQuowEFFMiss == nil) then iQuowEFFMiss = 0 end
sQuowShields = { [1] = {"small wooden shield", 2, "Wood"}, [2] = {"wooden Djelian shield", 2+(4/9), "Wood"}, [3] = {"small metal shield", 3+(8/9), "Steel"}, [4] = {"Ephebian round shield", 4+(3/9), "Wood"}, [5] = {"medium wooden shield", 4+(7/9), "Wood"}, [6] = {"medium bone shield", 5+(3/9), "Bone"}, [7] = {"crescent moon shield", 6+(2/9), "Bronze"}, [8] = {"antique round shield", 6+(6/9), "Iron"}, [9] = {"thousand rose shield", 7+(2/9), "Steel"}, [10] = {"medium metal shield", 7+(6/9), "Steel"}, [11] = {"slice of black pudding", 7+(7/9), "Blood"}, [12] = {"portable running water shield", 8+(1/9), "Copper"}, [13] = {"large wooden shield", 8+(6/9), "Wood"}, [14] = {"oval bronze shield", 9+(1/9), "Bronze"}, [15] = {"black iron shield", 10+(1/9), "Iron"}, [16] = {"three star shield", 11, "Steel"}, [17] = {"large metal shield", 11+(4/9), "Iron"}, [18] = {"Tsortean metal shield", 12, "Steel"}, [19] = {"emerald studded shield", 12+(4/9), "Steel"}, [20] = {"ornate bone shield", 12+(8/9), "Iron"}, [21] = {"sapphire studded shield", 13+(3/9), "Steel"}, [22] = {"bronze tower shield", 13+(8/9), "Bronze"}, [23] = {"Klatchian steel tower shield", 14+(3/9), "Klatchian steel"}, [24] = {"enormous spider carapace", 15+(3/9), "Octiron"}, [25] = {"giant turtle shell", 17+(2/9), "giant turtle keratin"}, }
sQuowUtensils = { [1] = {"potato peeler", (2/9), "Steel"}, [2] = {"old iron saucepan", (5/9), "Iron"}, [3] = {"small B'cket's bucket", 1+(5/9), "Steel"}, [4] = {"meat cleaver", 1+(7/9), "Steel"}, [5] = {"large bucket", 2+(4/9), "Wood and Brass"}, [6] = {"deluxe steel pan", 2+(6/9), "Steel"}, [7] = {"rolling pin", 3+(3/9), "Wood"}, [8] = {"crystal ladle", 3+(8/9), "Crystal"}, [9] = {"antique washing dolly", 4+(2/9), "Wood and Copper"}, [10] = {"small cauldron", 4+(4/9), "Iron"}, [11] = {"large battered kettle", 4+(6/9), "Iron"}, [12] = {"frying pan", 5, "Iron"}, [13] = {"flatiron", 6+(1/9), "Metal"}, [14] = {"coal scuttle", 7, "Steel"}, [15] = {"giant spatula", 8, "Steel"}, [16] = {"plain washboard", 8+(8/9), "Wood and Iron"}, [17] = {"majmar", 9+(4/9), "Clay"}, [18] = {"old rusty saucepan", 10, "Iron"}, [19] = {"huge bucket", 15+(1/9), "Wood and Brass"}, [20] = {"enormous bucket", 28+(4/9), "Wood"}, }
-- Check if the user has aliases enabled or not if (GetCurrentValue("enable_aliases") ~= 1) then Note("") ColourNote("red", "", "Quow's EFF Stats Warning:") ColourNote("orange", "", "Your aliases in Mushclient are disabled!") Note("This means you will not be able to use the 'eff stats', 'eff reset' or 'eff suggest' commands added by the plugin.") Note("To enable aliases, in Mushclient menus go to File->World Properties->Input->Aliases, tick 'Enable Aliases' on this page, then click 'OK'") Note("") end
function QuowHideEFF (sName, sLine, wildcards) Note("Quow's EFF Stats Plugin is now HIDING successful EFF block messages.") SetTriggerOption("QuowFloaterBlock", "omit_from_output", "y") bHideEFF = true SetVariable("bHideEFF", tostring(bHideEFF)) end function QuowShowEFF (sName, sLine, wildcards) Note("Quow's EFF Stats Plugin is now SHOWING successful EFF block messages.") SetTriggerOption("QuowFloaterBlock", "omit_from_output", "n") bHideEFF = false SetVariable("bHideEFF", tostring(bHideEFF)) end
iMyDef = 0 bForWitches = false iWeightBonus = 0 function QuowDefensiveGetter (sName, sLine, wildcards) bForWitches = false iWeightBonus = 0 EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveCheck", true) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveListCheck", true) Send("skills ma.sp.de") end function QuowDefensiveModifiedGetter (sName, sLine, wildcards) bForWitches = false iWeightBonus = 0 local iThisBonus = tonumber(wildcards[2]) if (iThisBonus < 0) then iThisBonus = 0 end if (iThisBonus > 1000) then iThisBonus = 1000 end iWeightBonus = iThisBonus EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveCheck", true) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveListCheck", true) Send("skills ma.sp.de") end function WitchDefensiveModifiedGetter (sName, sLine, wildcards) bForWitches = true iWeightBonus = 0 local iThisBonus = tonumber(wildcards[2]) if (iThisBonus < 0) then iThisBonus = 0 end if (iThisBonus > 1000) then iThisBonus = 1000 end iWeightBonus = iThisBonus EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveCheck", true) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveListCheck", true) Send("skills ma.sp.de") end function WitchDefensiveGetter (sName, sLine, wildcards) bForWitches = true EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveCheck", true) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveListCheck", true) Send("skills ma.sp.de") end function QuowDefensiveParse (sName, sLine, wildcards) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveCheck", false) EnableTrigger("QuowDefensiveListCheck", false) iMyDef = tonumber(wildcards[3]) if (bForWitches == true) then DoAfterSpecial (0.2, 'WitchUtensils()', sendto.script) else DoAfterSpecial (0.2, 'ShowShields()', sendto.script) end bForWitches = false end -- For wizard EFF shields function ShowShields() local iWeight = iMyDef / iWizardWeightMultiplier if (bHasCowbar == false and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) ~= nil and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) == true and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 19) >= 3) then bHasCowbar = true end local iWeightMultiplier = 100 Note("") if (iWeightBonus > 0) then ColourNote("cyan", "", "[Note: All shields for this check have had an additional ", "yellow", "", iWeightBonus .. "% weight added", "cyan", "", "]") Note("") iWeightMultiplier = (100 + iWeightBonus) end iWeightMultiplier = iWeightMultiplier / 100 ColourNote("orange", "", "Your defensive bonus is " .. tostring(iMyDef) .. ", recommended shield weight is roughly " .. string.format("%.2f", iWeight) .. " lb") Note("Some possibilities and recommended bonuses, try yourself to test your own blockrate:") local sColour = "" iCutOffLow = 0 for iShieldID, sThisShield in ipairs(sQuowShields) do local iThisWeight = sThisShield[2] iThisWeight = iThisWeight * iWeightMultiplier iPercent = (iThisWeight / iWeight) if (iPercent <= 0.95) then iCutOffLow = iCutOffLow + 1 end end iCutOffLow = iCutOffLow - 2 if (iCutOffLow < 1) then iCutOffLow = 0 end local sShowTheseShields = {} local iLongestShield = 0 for iShieldID, sThisShield in ipairs(sQuowShields) do if (iShieldID > iCutOffLow) then table.insert(sShowTheseShields, sThisShield) if (string.len(sThisShield[1]) > iLongestShield) then iLongestShield = string.len(sThisShield[1]) end end end iLongestShield = iLongestShield + 2 for _, sThisShield in pairs(sShowTheseShields) do local iThisWeight = sThisShield[2] iThisWeight = iThisWeight * iWeightMultiplier iPercent = (iThisWeight / iWeight) sColour = "green" sBlockrate = "" if (iPercent <= 0.95) then sColour = "green" sBlockrate = "99.9+%" elseif (iPercent <= 0.99) then sColour = "cyan" sBlockrate = "98+%" elseif (iPercent <= 1.05) then sColour = "yellow" sBlockrate = "90+%" elseif (iPercent <= 1.1) then sColour = "orange" sBlockrate = "80+%" else sBlockrate = "<80%" sColour = "red" end if (bHasCowbar == true) then Hyperlink ("!!bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b:QuowItemDetails(" .. sThisShield[1] .. ")", sThisShield[1], "Show CowBar item details", "cyan", "", 0) else ColourTell("cyan", "", sThisShield[1]) end Tell(string.format("%-" .. (iLongestShield - string.len(sThisShield[1])) .. "s", ": ") .. string.format("%.2f", iThisWeight) .. "lb [" .. sThisShield[3] .. "] ") ColourTell(sColour, "", sBlockrate) Note(" blockrate. " .. string.format("%.0f", iThisWeight * iWizardWeightMultiplier) .. "+ bonus") end sShowTheseShields = nil end
-- For witch utensil shields function WitchUtensils() local iWeight = iMyDef / iWitchWeightMultiplier if (bHasCowbar == false and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) ~= nil and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 17) == true and GetPluginInfo("bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b", 19) >= 3) then bHasCowbar = true end local iWeightMultiplier = 100 Note("") if (iWeightBonus > 0) then ColourNote("cyan", "", "[Note: All utensils for this check have had an additional ", "yellow", "", iWeightBonus .. "% weight added", "cyan", "", "]") Note("") iWeightMultiplier = (100 + iWeightBonus) end iWeightMultiplier = iWeightMultiplier / 100 ColourNote("orange", "", "Your defensive bonus is " .. tostring(iMyDef) .. ", recommended utensil weight is roughly " .. string.format("%.2f", iWeight) .. " lb") Note("Some possibilities, try them to see how your blockrate is:") local sColour = "" iCutOffLow = 0 for iUtensilID, sThisUtensil in ipairs(sQuowUtensils) do local iThisWeight = sThisUtensil[2] iThisWeight = iThisWeight * iWeightMultiplier iPercent = (iThisWeight / iWeight) if (iPercent <= 0.95) then iCutOffLow = iCutOffLow + 1 end end iCutOffLow = iCutOffLow - 2 if (iCutOffLow < 1) then iCutOffLow = 0 end local sShowTheseUtensils = {} local iLongestUtensil = 0 for iUtensilID, sThisUtensil in ipairs(sQuowUtensils) do if (iUtensilID > iCutOffLow) then table.insert(sShowTheseUtensils, sThisUtensil) if (string.len(sThisUtensil[1]) > iLongestUtensil) then iLongestUtensil = string.len(sThisUtensil[1]) end end end iLongestUtensil = iLongestUtensil + 2 for _, sThisUtensil in pairs(sShowTheseUtensils) do local iThisWeight = sThisUtensil[2] iThisWeight = iThisWeight * iWeightMultiplier iPercent = (iThisWeight / iWeight) sColour = "green" sBlockrate = "" if (iPercent <= 0.95) then sColour = "green" sBlockrate = "99.9+%" elseif (iPercent <= 0.99) then sColour = "cyan" sBlockrate = "98+%" elseif (iPercent <= 1.05) then sColour = "yellow" sBlockrate = "90+%" elseif (iPercent <= 1.1) then sColour = "orange" sBlockrate = "80+%" else sBlockrate = "<80%" sColour = "red" end if (bHasCowbar == true) then Hyperlink ("!!bfe35205f026786ea1d56e3b:QuowItemDetails(" .. sThisUtensil[1] .. ")", sThisUtensil[1], "Show CowBar item details", "cyan", "", 0) else ColourTell("green", "", sThisUtensil[1]) end Tell(string.format("%-" .. (iLongestUtensil - string.len(sThisUtensil[1])) .. "s", ": ") .. string.format("%.2f", iThisWeight) .. "lb [" .. sThisUtensil[3] .. "] ") ColourTell(sColour, "", sBlockrate) Note(" blockrate. " .. string.format("%.0f", iThisWeight * iWitchWeightMultiplier) .. "+ bonus") end sShowTheseUtensils = nil end
-- ***************** -- * Show Function * -- ***************** function QuowEFFStats () local iTotalAmount = iQuowEFFBlocks + iQuowEFFMiss local iHitRate = 0 local iHitsPerKnockdown = iTotalAmount if (iTotalAmount > 0) then iHitRate = ((iQuowEFFBlocks / iTotalAmount) * 100) end if (tonumber(iQuowEFFDrops) > 0) then iHitsPerKnockdown = iQuowEFFBlocks / tonumber(iQuowEFFDrops) end ColourNote ("orange", "", "EFF Block Rate = " .. string.format("%.2f", iHitRate) .. "% (" .. tostring(iQuowEFFBlocks) .. " / " .. tostring(iTotalAmount) .. ")") ColourNote ("orange", "", "EFF Total Knockdowns = " .. tostring(iQuowEFFDrops) .. " (" .. string.format("%.2f", iHitsPerKnockdown) .. " hits per knockdown)") end
-- ****************** -- * Reset Function * -- ****************** function QuowEFFReset () iQuowEFFDrops = 0 iQuowEFFBlocks = 0 iQuowEFFMiss = 0 Note("EFF Stats Reset to 0") end
-- *************************** -- * Add/Take/Drop Functions * -- *************************** function QuowLogBlock (sName, sLine, wildcards) iQuowEFFBlocks = iQuowEFFBlocks + 1 end
function QuowLogMiss (sName, sLine, wildcards) iQuowEFFMiss = iQuowEFFMiss + 1 end
function QuowLogDrop (sName, sLine, wildcards) iQuowEFFDrops = iQuowEFFDrops + 1 end
function OnPluginClose () SetVariable("iQuowEFFBlocks", tostring(iQuowEFFBlocks)) SetVariable("iQuowEFFMiss", tostring(iQuowEFFMiss)) SetVariable("iQuowEFFDrops", tostring(iQuowEFFDrops)) end -- OnPluginClose
function OnPluginInstall() -- Hide messages? if (bHideEFF == true) then Note("Quow's EFF Stats Plugin is hiding successful EFF block messages.") SetTriggerOption("QuowFloaterBlock", "omit_from_output", "y") end end

trigger.match: but your (?:\w+\b\W*?){1,6} swoops in and absorbs? all of the blow\.$
trigger.name: QuowFloaterBlock

trigger.match: ^Your (?:\w+\b\W*?){1,6} is too late to block (?:.+) attack\.$
trigger.name: QuowLogFloaterMiss

trigger.match: ^In blocking the attack (?:\w+\b\W*?){1,6} floating around you is knocked out of orbit\.$
trigger.name: QuowFShieldDrop

trigger.match: ^You realise that (?:\w+\b\W*?){1,6} is no longer floating around you\.$
trigger.name: QuowFShieldDrop2
